remarks: Closure of a finite sum of complex numbers ` A ( k ) ` .  A version of ~ fsummulc1 using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fsummulc1f.ph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fsummulclf.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsummulclf.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
fsummulclf.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsummulc1f $p |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. A B x. C ) = sum_ k e. A ( B x. C ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d C k $.
